name: Death Tyrant
oracle_text:
Menace
Negative Energy Cone — Whenever an attacking creature you control or a blocking creature an opponent controls dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
{5}{B}: Return Death Tyrant from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

name: Danse Macabre
oracle_text:
Whenever you sacrifice another nontoken artifact or creature, exile it.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice another artifact or creature: Draw a card.
{3}, {T}, Sacrifice Danse Macabre: Roll a d10. Return up to X cards from among cards exiled with Danse Macabre to their owners' hands, where X is the result.

name: Karazikar, the Eye Tyrant
oracle_text:
Whenever you attack a player, tap target creature that player controls and goad it. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)
Whenever an opponent attacks another one of your opponents, you and the attacking player each draw a card and lose 1 life.

name: Sword of Hours
oracle_text:
Whenever equipped creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage, roll a d12. If the result is greater than the damage dealt or the result is 12, double the number of +1/+1 counters on that creature.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Clay Golem
oracle_text:
{6}, Roll a d8: Monstrosity X, where X is the result. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put X +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
Berserk — When Clay Golem becomes monstrous, destroy target permanent.

name: Ride the Avalanche
oracle_text: The next spell you cast this turn can be cast as though it had flash. When you cast your next spell this turn, put X +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature, where X is the mana value of that spell.

name: Catti-brie of Mithral Hall
oracle_text:
First strike, reach
Whenever Catti-brie of Mithral Hall attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Equipment attached to it.
{1}, Remove all +1/+1 counters from Catti-brie: It deals X damage to target attacking or blocking creature an opponent controls, where X is the number of counters removed this way.

name: Song of Inspiration
oracle_text:
Choose up to two target permanent cards in your graveyard. Roll a d20 and add the total mana value of those cards.
1-14 | Return those cards to your hand.
15+ | Return those cards to your hand. You gain life equal to their total mana value.

name: Belt of Giant's Strength
oracle_text:
Equipped creature has base power and toughness 10/10.
Equip {10}. This ability costs {X} less to activate where X is the power of the creature it targets.

name: Winged Boots
oracle_text:
Equipped creature has flying and ward {4}. (Whenever equipped creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {4}.
Equip {1}
flavor_text: Get carried away.

name: Netherese Puzzle-Ward
oracle_text:
Focus Beam — At the beginning of your upkeep, roll a d4. Scry X, where X is the result.
Perfect Illumination — Whenever you roll a die's highest natural result, draw a card.
flavor_text: Each configuration reveals a potential future.

name: Diviner's Portent
oracle_text:
Roll a d20 and add the number of cards in your hands.
1-14 | Draw X cards.
15+ | Scry X, then draw X cards.

name: Valiant Endeavor
oracle_text: Roll two d6 and choose on result. Destroy each creature with power greater than or equal to that result. Then create a number of 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with vigilance equal to the other result.

name: Robe of Stars
Mantle of the Avenger
oracle_text:
Enchant creature you control
When Mantle of the Avenger enters the battlefield, return any number of target Aura and/or Equipment cards from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Aura and Equipment attached to it.

name: Holy Avenger
oracle_text:
Whenever Holy Avenger attacks, another target attacking creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn.
Whenever a creature or planeswalker you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: Ride into legend.

name: Storvald, Frost Giant Jarl
oracle_text:
Ward {3}
Other creatures you control have ward {3}.
Whenever Storvald, Frost Giant Jarl enters the battlefield or attacks, choose one or both —
• Target creature has base power and toughness 7/7 until end of turn.
• Target creature has base power and toughness 1/1 until end of turn.

name: Nature's Lore
oracle_text: Search your library for a Forest card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Druidcraft is a simple invocation to spirits of nature, promising a glimpse of nature's secrets.

name: Heroic Intervention
oracle_text: Permanents you control gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Stay close, and their wrathful flames will not harm you."
—Galea

name: Swiftfoot Boots
oracle_text:
Equipped creature has hexproof and haste.
Equip {1}
flavor_text: One who wears magical *boots of striding and springing* can jump astounding distances.

name: Blink Dog
oracle_text:
Double strike
Teleport — {3}{W}: Blink Dog phases out. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until your next turn.)

name: Temple of the Dragon Queen
oracle_text:
As Temple of the Dragon Queen enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand. Temple of the Dragon Queen enters the battlefield tapped unless you revealed a Dragon card this way or you control a Dragon.
As Temple of the Dragon Queen enters the battlefield, choose a color.
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

name: Neverwinter Dryad
oracle_text: {2}, Sacrifice Neverwinter Dryad: Search your library for a basic Forest card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

name: Loyal Warhound
oracle_text:
Vigilance
When Loyal Warhound enters the battlefield, if an opponent controls more lands than you, search your library for a basic Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

name: Asmodeus the Archfiend
oracle_text:
Binding Contract — If you would draw a card, exile the top card of your library face down instead.
{B}{B}{B}: Draw seven cards.
{B}: Return all cards exiled with Asmodeus the Archfiend to their owner's hand and you lose that much life.

name: The Book of Exalted Deeds
oracle_text:
At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, create a 3/3 white Angel creature token with flying.
{W}{W}{W}, {T}, Exile The Book of Exalted Deeds: Put an enlightened counter on target Angel. It gains "You can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game." Activate only as a sorcery.

name: Asmodeus the Archfiend
oracle_text:
Binding Contract — If you would draw a card, exile the top card of your library face down instead.
{B}{B}{B}: Draw seven cards.
{B}: Return all cards exiled with Asmodeus the Archfiend to their owner's hand and you lose that much life.

name: Leather Armor
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +0/+1 and has ward {1}. (Whenever equipped creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {1}.)
Equip {0}. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text: Lightweight, flexible, protective.

name: Neverwinter Dryad
oracle_text: {2}, Sacrifice Neverwinter Dryad: Search your library for a basic Forest card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Its life force entwined with its tree, a dryad is an elusive and solitary being that wishes only to be left alone.

name: Blink Dog
oracle_text:
Double strike
Teleport — {3}{W}: Blink Dog phases out. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until your next turn.)
flavor_text: Blink dogs protect the wild places of the world, driving away evil influences.

name: Temple of the Dragon Queen
oracle_text:
As Temple of the Dragon Queen enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand. Temple of the Dragon Queen enters the battlefield tapped unless you revealed a Dragon card this way or you control a Dragon.
As Temple of the Dragon Queen enters the battlefield, choose a color.
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

name: Aberrant Mind Sorcerer
oracle_text:
Psionic Spells — When Aberrant Mind Sorcerer enters the battlefield, choose target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard, then roll a d20.
1-9 | You may put that card on top of your library.
10-20 | Return that card to your hand.

name: Loyal Warhound
oracle_text:
Vigilance
When Loyal Warhound enters the battlefield, if an opponent controls more lands than you, search your library for a basic Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: A paladin's steed is a celestial spirit in animal form.

name: Grim Bounty
oracle_text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: Freed from the need to pay tribute to the dragon, the villages gladly paid the dragon-slayers instead.

name: Greataxe
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +4/+0.
Equip {5} ({5}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: "If you're so mighty, scaled one, then why are you dead?"

name: Arborea Pegasus
oracle_text:
Flying
When Arborea Pegasus enters the battlefield, target creature gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: The noble steeds of the elven gods can sometimes be persuaded to allow mere mortals on their backs.

name: Priest of Ancient Lore
oracle_text: When Priest of Ancient Lore enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life and draw a card.
flavor_text: "We are a product of our ancestors, the apotheosis of countless noble generations. Speak their names with reverence, and they will guide your path."

name: Steadfast Paladin
oracle_text: Lifelink
flavor_text: "When I made my oath to Moradin, I left selfishness and cowardice behind. Every battle, I make that commitment anew."

name: Deadly Dispute
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.
Draw two cards and create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: "That's a pretty ring! Trade you my knife for it!"

name: Hoard Robber
oracle_text: Whenever Hoard Robber deals combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: "And to think, a year go I was picking pockets in Waterdeep."

name: Thieves' Tools
oracle_text:
When Thieves' Tools enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
Equipped creature can't be blocked as long as its power is 3 or less.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Armory Veteran
oracle_text: As long as Armory Veteran is equipped, it has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text: "This one is for goblins, this one is for owlbears, this one is for toast, and this one is for . . ."

name: Boosts of Speed
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has haste.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: Click your heels and become the wind.

name: Compelled Duel
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn and must be blocked this turn if able.
flavor_text: "You might be four times my size, but I will not be ignored!"

name: Plummet
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying.
flavor_text: The dragon's noxious breath withered the forest. The whistle of a hundred arrows filled the air. The ground roiled as if shaken by an earthquake. The tyrant fell from the sky.

name: Ranger's Longbow
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+1 and has reach.
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: With the right weapon, a fearsome beholder is nothing more than a big floating bullseye.

name: Underdark Basilisk
oracle_text: Deathtouch
flavor_text:
"See how statues all have chunks bitten out of them? We're dealing with a Basilisk, or I'm a froghemoth."
—Larissa Kyriln, learned warlock

name: Hand of Vecna
Iron Golem
oracle_text:
Vigilance
Iron Golem attacks or blocks each combat if able.
flavor_text: Once an iron golem is set to a task, it won't turn aside until that task is complete or it has been destroyed.

name: Spare Dagger
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has "Whenever this creature attacks, you may sacrifice Spare Dagger. When you do, this creature deals 1 damage to any target."
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
